response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This product holds immense value to us, but recognizing its significance to you, we are excited to offer it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is a special opportunity to own a piece that is not only valuable but also holds a unique place in our company's history. We believe this price reflects the true worth of the product while allowing you to secure it at a favorable rate. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
